abstract: How will you be remembered by your great-grandchildren?
description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families' voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents' adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002004; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007); Active; 2007
